001package andesite.player;
002
003import andesite.send.AudioProvider;
004
005import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007
008public interface AndesitePlayer extends BasePlayer, AudioProvider {
009    /**
010     * Returns the track mixer for this player.
011     *
012     * @return The track mixer for this player.
013     */
014    @Nonnull
015    @CheckReturnValue
016    AndesiteTrackMixer mixer();
017    
018    /**
019     * Returns the state of the mixer.
020     *
021     * @return The state of the mixer.
022     */
023    @Nonnull
024    @CheckReturnValue
025    MixerState mixerState();
026    
027    /**
028     * Requests the player switches to the mixer as soon as possible.
029     *
030     * <br>The mixer will be polled for new frames until it returns one.
031     * While it doesn't return one, the current provider will be used instead.
032     */
033    void switchToMixer();
034    
035    /**
036     * Requests the player switches to the default provider as soon as possible.
037     *
038     * <br>The default provider will be polled for new frames until it returns one.
039     * While it doesn't return one, the current provider will be used instead.
040     */
041    void switchToSingle();
042    
043    enum MixerState {
044        /**
045         * The mixer is disabled.
046         */
047        DISABLED(false),
048        /**
049         * The mixer is being enabled, but is currently disabled.
050         */
051        ENABLING(false),
052        /**
053         * The mixer is enabled.
054         */
055        ENABLED(true),
056        /**
057         * The mixer is being disabled, but is currently enabled.
058         */
059        DISABLING(true);
060        
061        private final boolean isUsingMixer;
062        
063        MixerState(boolean isUsingMixer) {
064            this.isUsingMixer = isUsingMixer;
065        }
066        
067        @CheckReturnValue
068        public boolean isUsingMixer() {
069            return isUsingMixer;
070        }
071    }
072}
